org.lenskit.results

Class Results

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lenskit.results.Results

  • public final class Results
extends Object

    Utility functions for working with results.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static BasicResult basicCopy(Result r)
      Create a basic result that has the same ID and score as another result (a basic copy of the result).
      static Function<Result,BasicResult> basicCopyFunction()
      Guava function that converts a result to a basic result.
      static Equivalence<Result> basicEquivalence()
      An equivalence relation that considers objects to be equal if they are equal after being converted to basic results (that is, their IDs and scores are equal).
      static BasicResult create(long id, double score)
      Create a new result with just and ID and a score.

      Convert a map entry to a basic result.

      Function to convert map entries to basic results.

      Get an ordering (comparator) that orders results by ID.

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static BasicResult create(long id,
                                 double score)

        Create a new result with just and ID and a score.

        Parameters:
        id - The ID.
        score - The score.
        Returns:
        The result instance.

      • basicCopy

        public static BasicResult basicCopy(Result r)

        Create a basic result that has the same ID and score as another result (a basic copy of the result).

        Parameters:
        r - The result to copy.
        Returns:
        A basic result with the same ID and score as r. This may be the same object as r, since basic results are immutable.

      • rescore

        public static RescoredResult rescore(Result r,
                                     double s)

        Create a rescored result.

        Parameters:
        r - The result to score.
        s - The new score.
        Returns:
        A RescoredResult that wraps r with a new score of s.

      • rescore

        public static RescoredResult rescore(@Nonnull
                                     Result orig,
                                     @Nullable
                                     Result score)

        Create a rescored result with details.

        Parameters:
        orig - The original result.
        score - The new result, or null for no score (the resulting result will have no score).
        Returns:
        A rescored result with the ID but the new score.

      • newResultList

        @Nonnull
public static ResultList newResultList(@Nonnull
                                                List<? extends Result> results)

        Create a new result list.

        Parameters:
        results - The results to include in the list.
        Returns:
        The result list.

 @Nonnull
public static <R extends Result> ResultList newResultList(R... results)

        Create a new result list.

        Parameters:
        results - The results to include in the list.
        R - the result type
        Returns:
        The result list.

public static ResultMap newResultMap(@Nonnull
                                              Iterable<? extends Result> results)

        Create a new result list.

        Parameters:

        Returns:

        @SafeVarargs
 @Nonnull
public static <R extends Result> ResultMap newResultMap(R... results)

        Create a new result list.

        Parameters:

        R - the result type
        Returns:
        The result list.

      • basicCopyFunction

        public static Function<Result,BasicResult> basicCopyFunction()

        Guava function that converts a result to a basic result. This is just basicCopy(Result) exposed as a Guava Function for use in processing lists, etc.

        Returns:
        A function that maps results to basic (only score and ID) versions of them.

      • fromEntry

        public static BasicResult fromEntry(Map.Entry<Long,Double> entry)

        Convert a map entry to a basic result.

        Parameters:
        entry - The map entry.
        Returns:
        The basic result.

      • fromEntryFunction

        public static Function<Map.Entry<Long,Double>,Result> fromEntryFunction()

        Function to convert map entries to basic results.

        Returns:
        A function that converts map entries to basic results.

      • basicEquivalence

        public static Equivalence<Result> basicEquivalence()

        An equivalence relation that considers objects to be equal if they are equal after being converted to basic results (that is, their IDs and scores are equal).

        Returns:
        The equivalence relation.

      • idOrder

        public static Ordering<Result> idOrder()

        Get an ordering (comparator) that orders results by ID.

        Returns:
        An ordering that orders results by ID (increasing).

      • scoreOrder

        public static Ordering<Result> scoreOrder()

        Get an ordering (comparator) that orders results by score.

        Returns:
        An ordering that orders results by score (increasing).

      • keyExtractor

        public static KeyExtractor<Result> keyExtractor()

        Get a key extractor that extracts the result’s ID as its key.

        Returns:
        The key extractor.
